Journal.Title: Zhongguo Zhong yao za zhi = Zhongguo zhongyao zazhi = China journal of Chinese materia medica

Article.ArticleTitle: [Advance in the compatibility and dismantlement research on traditional Chinese compound prescription].

AbstractText: The progress in the compatibility and dismantlement research on Traditional Chinese compound prescription was involved to provide references for the exploitation and utilization of the Chinese herbs.
The major models, methods, objectives of the compatibility and dismantlement research on Traditional Chinese compound prescription were reviewed.
Multiple and crossing ways were used in the dismantlement study of compound and most of them are foundation studies of reasonable verification of the origin prescription.
The compatibility and dismantlement research on Traditional Chinese compound prescription has extensive applied prospect and will be developed further.
